Bloodthirst is one of the Daggers in Baldur's Gate 3. Bloodthirst is the legendary dagger dropped by Orin, at the Bhaal Temple. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
